cli

Class Place

  • java.lang.Object
    • cli.Place

  • public class Place
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Place used to place the players ships on the board after the configuration of a new game and before playing

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Game game
      Game in which we will be placing the players' ships

        public Place(java.util.Scanner scan,

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • choosePlacing

        private void choosePlacing(java.util.Scanner scan,
                           java.util.Random random,
                           java.lang.String playerName,
                           int playerNumber)
        Chooses the type of placement (manual or automatic) for the ships of a given player
        Parameters:
        scan - scanner used to get input from the console
        random - random number generator for the automatic ship placement
        playerName - name of the player whose ship placement will be chosen
        playerNumber - number of the player whose ship placement will be chosen

      • placePlayerShips

                              java.lang.String playerName,
                              int playerNumber)
        Manually places a players ships on the board
        Parameters:
        scan - scanner used to get input from the console
        playerName - name of the player whose ships will be manually placed
        playerNumber - number of the player whose ships will be manually placed

      • repositionShips

        private void repositionShips(java.util.Scanner scan,
                             java.lang.String playerName,
                             int playerNumber)
        Allows the player to change the position of some ships
        Parameters:
        scan - scanner used to get input from the console
        playerName - name of the player that will be asked about repositioning their ships
        playerNumber - number of the player that will be asked about repositioning their ships

      • readShipPosition

        private java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> readShipPosition(java.lang.String position)
        Reads a ship position and orientation from a string extracting the resulting elements to a vector
        Parameters:
        position - string with the position in letters and orientation (H or V)
        Returns:
        vector with the result of the reading: true or false to indicate if reading was successful, line (int), column (int) and orientation (true or false)

      • changeShipPosition

        private void changeShipPosition(java.util.Scanner scan,
                                int playerNumber)
        Tries to change a given player's ship position
        Parameters:
        scan - scanner used to get input from the console
        playerNumber - number of the player whose whip will be repositioned

      • placeShips

        private void placeShips(java.util.Scanner scan,
                        java.util.Random random)
        Chooses type of placement for each players ships
        Parameters:
        scan - scanner used to get input from the console
        random - random number generator for when automatic placement is chosen
